TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer that forms in follicular cells in the thyroid. It grows slowly and is highly treatable.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "follicular thyroid cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de tiroides folicular"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cáncer que se forma en las células foliculares de la tiroidea. Crece despacio y su tasa de curación es alta.
